darkhistory.spec.spectoolsÂ¶

spectools contains functions useful for processing spectral data.

Functions

discretize(func_dNdE, eng) Discretizes a continuous function.
get_bin_bound(eng) Returns the bin boundary of an abscissa.
get_log_bin_width(eng) Return the log bin width of the abscissa.
rebin_N_arr(N_arr, in_eng, out_eng) Rebins an array of particle number with fixed energy.
